participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Driven and passionate, she is always striving for excellence in everything she does.
participant_1.background: i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread. my favorite color is yellow. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.

content.text: Whazzup? I like to workout and exercise.
